item.title: Catherine add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Loyalty to country ALWAYS. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Catherine add a quote by C. S. Lewis
item.description: "I didn’t go to religion to make me happy. I always knew a bottle of Port would do that. If you want a religion to make you feel really comfortable, I certainly don’t recommend Christianity." -- C. S. Lewis

item.title: Catherine add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "It isn't Narnia, you know," sobbed Lucy. "It's you. We shan't meet you there. And how can we live, never meeting you?" "But you shall meet me, dear one," said Aslan. "Are -are you there too, Sir?" said Edmund. "I am," said Aslan. "But there I have another name. You must learn to know me by that name. This was the very reason why you were brought to Narnia, that by knowing me here for a little, you may know me better there." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Catherine add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "It is a very funny thing that the sleepier you are, the longer you take about getting to bed." -- C.S. Lewis
